targets.query: select count("callId")   as "failure" from "dhruva.trunkMetric" WHERE  "response" != 200 AND "trunk" =~ /$trunkName/  AND $timeFilter AND "environment" =~ /$cluster/  AND "instanceName" =~ /$instance/
select count("callId")   as "total" from "dhruva.trunkMetric" WHERE "trunk" =~ /$trunkName/ AND $timeFilter AND "environment" =~ /$cluster/  AND "instanceName" =~ /$instance/

select count("callId")   as "failure" from "dhruva.trunkMetric" WHERE  "response" != 200 AND "trunk" =~ /$trunkName/  AND $timeFilter AND "environment" =~ /$cluster/  AND "instanceName" =~ /$instance/
select count("callId")   as "total" from "dhruva.trunkMetric" WHERE "trunk" =~ /$trunkName/ AND $timeFilter AND "environment" =~ /$cluster/  AND "instanceName" =~ /$instance/

select count("callId")   as "success" from "dhruva.trunkMetric" WHERE  "response" = 200 AND "trunk" =~ /$trunkName/  AND $timeFilter
select count("callId")   as "total" from "dhruva.trunkMetric" WHERE "trunk" =~ /$trunkName/ AND $timeFilter
select count("callId")   as "success" from "dhruva.trunkMetric" WHERE  "response" = 200 AND "trunk" =~ /$trunkName/  AND $timeFilter
select count("callId")   as "total" from "dhruva.trunkMetric" WHERE "trunk" =~ /$trunkName/ AND $timeFilter
select count("callId")   as "success" from "dhruva.trunkMetric" WHERE  "response" = 200 AND "trunk" =~ /$trunkName/  AND $timeFilter
select count("callId")   as "total" from "dhruva.trunkMetric" WHERE "trunk" =~ /$trunkName/ AND $timeFilter

select count("callId")   as "total" from "dhruva.trunkMetric" WHERE "trunk" =~ /$trunkName/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT max("inboundCount") FROM "dhruva.trunkcps" WHERE $timeFilter AND "environment" =~ /$cluster/  GROUP BY "trunk",  time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT max("outboundCount") FROM "dhruva.trunkcps" WHERE $timeFilter  AND "environment" =~ /$cluster/  AND "instanceName" =~ /$instance/ GROUP BY  "trunk", "outboundCount", time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT max(lbcount) FROM "dhruva.trunkLbs" where "trunk" =~/$trunkName/ AND $timeFilter AND "environment" =~ /$cluster/ AND "instanceName" =~ /$instance/  group by serverGroupElement
SELECT max(lbcount) FROM "dhruva.trunkLbs" where "trunk" =~/$trunkName/ AND $timeFilter AND "environment" =~ /$cluster/ AND "instanceName" =~ /$instance/  group by serverGroupElement
SELECT max(lbcount) FROM "dhruva.trunkLbs" where "trunk" =~/$trunkName/ AND $timeFilter AND "environment" =~ /$cluster/ AND "instanceName" =~ /$instance/  group by serverGroupElement
SELECT max(lbcount) FROM "dhruva.trunkLbs" where "trunk" =~/$trunkName/ AND $timeFilter AND "environment" =~ /$cluster/ AND "instanceName" =~ /$instance/  group by serverGroupElement
SELECT "status" FROM "trunkstatus" WHERE $timeFilter AND "environment" =~ /$cluster/ AND "instanceName" =~ /$instance/ GROUP BY "trunk"
SELECT "status" FROM "trunkServerGroupstatus" WHERE $timeFilter AND "environment" =~ /$cluster/ AND "instanceName" =~ /$instance/ GROUP BY "trunkServerGroup"
SELECT  trunkName as Trunk FROM "trunkstatus" WHERE time > now() - 3m AND "environment" =~ /$cluster/  AND "instanceName" =~ /$instance/
SELECT  mapping as Map FROM "trunkstatus" WHERE time > now() - 3m AND "environment" =~ /$cluster/  AND "instanceName" =~ /$instance/

list.definition: show tag values from "dhruva.trunkMetric" with key = "trunk"
list.label: trunkName
list.name: trunkName
list.query: show tag values from "dhruva.trunkMetric" with key = "trunk"

list.definition: show tag values from "dhruva.trunkMetric" with key="environment"
list.label: clusterName
list.name: cluster
list.query: show tag values from "dhruva.trunkMetric" with key="environment"

list.definition: show tag values from "trunkServerGroupstatus" with key = "instanceName" WHERE "environment" =~ /$cluster/ AND time >= now()
list.label: Instance Name
list.name: instance
list.query: show tag values from "trunkServerGroupstatus" with key = "instanceName" WHERE "environment" =~ /$cluster/ AND time >= now()
